[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Event Management System (EMS) defines requirements to streamline event planning, registration, and feedback collection.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: EMS enables event scheduling, secure payment processing, and attendee engagement.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: EMS integrates with email services, payment gateways, and calendar tools.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: EMS provides web and mobile interfaces for organizers and attendees.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: EMS operates on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: EMS supports REST APIs for third-party integrations.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: EMS ensures secure data exchange using HTTPS.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: EMS optimizes resource allocation for high-traffic events.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: EMS ensures 24/7 availability with scheduled maintenance.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: EMS configures for small and large-scale events.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: EMS connects to analytics tools for real-time reporting.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: EMS facilitates event scheduling, attendee management, and feedback collection.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: Designed for event organizers, participants, and administrators with minimal technical expertise.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: EMS depends on internet connectivity and external payment systems.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: EMS requires operational email services and payment gateways.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Feedback: Attendee feedback for event improvement.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with email services for attendee notifications (REQ-FUNC-002).
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall support payment gateways for ticket purchases (REQ-FUNC-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall allow organizers to schedule events with detailed descriptions, venues, ticketing options, and automated reminders for registered attendees (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall enable attendees to register, receive notifications, submit event feedback, and access personalized event recommendations (REQ-DB-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide a responsive design for multiple device compatibility.
[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-002: The interface shall feature an intuitive layout for event management.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall support up to many thousands concurrent users.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall process event registrations without significant delay, ensuring minimal latency even during peak traffic.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall securely store event details, registrations, and payment records.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The database shall support real-time updates and role-based access.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall follow a modular architecture for scalability.
[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-002: The system shall comply with ISO 27001 for data security.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall ensure GDPR-compliant data handling and meet WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards for inclusive usability.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall dynamically scale during peak periods, adjusting server resources in real-time to optimize performance.
[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-002: The system shall log and audit all critical actions.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Validates event scheduling, registration, payment processing, and compliance with GDPR and WCAG.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: Setup guides, user manuals, and API documentation.
[SEC] 5. References: GDPR documentation, ISO 27001 guidelines, WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards.
